lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [rock music] [dramatic music]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by side-stepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, as a note, we're still doing the subscriber giveaways tonight. Our next goal is 2700 subscribers. We'll be giving away another tabletop promo kit that are exclusive only to this now. You cannot find them anywhere else. So we'll be giving one of those away to somebody in the chat room, once we hit 2700 subscribers. Which is awesome! Also, we have our charity we run every week, 826LA. Marisha, if you want to explain that a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! 826LA is a non-profit tutoring program for kids K through 12th grade. And they're really big on creative writing and storytelling, and they also have a storefront, the Time Travel Mart, in--

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Echo Park

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you can also tutor for them! You should volunteer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is also great!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Volunteer to be a tutor for 826.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tutor to teach them to write modules for D&D.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Think you're smart, huh? Think you're smart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think you're smart?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think you're smart? Can you teach a 5th grader?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. And also, if you donate to 826LA at the end of the show today we'll read off some of the messages you guys wrote as part of donations, at the end of the show, so we'll give you personal thanks for that at the end of... of today. So that's be cool. Also, I'm wearing a shirt. You notice it's grey-ish colored, this is our second run of the first-- And I say first, because there's hopefully more to come soon-- Critical Role shirt. You guys keep asking for it, we finally set up a Teespring. It'll only be up for the next two weeks, and we're trying to hit certain goals, so that if we manage to hit a thousand tees sold, we're going to go ahead and do another full cast Q&A. If we can all find any that we're available for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're on Teespring.com/Critical-Role. We've already had a few trolls go in there and create their own T-shirts, and say that they're official when they're not, so don't buy those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not ours. It's those! That's what it looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this grey with full cast setup there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They didn't even ask us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the first ones we did in navy. These are done in grey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second edition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we'll probably retire this design after this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha and Taliesin? You said you wanted to...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! We we just did some voices for the new Marvel: Age of Ultron pinball game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did the voice of Ultron, so you can hear me be evil!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: up in there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. No! Doing a little Marisha Ray up in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speaking of Black Widow...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And speaking-- speaking of Black Widow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! So now two Black Widows in the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (makes high-five sound effect) Black Widow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, cause we all do Avengers Assemble. On Disney XD.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every Sunday morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What what what!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Avengers assemble!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thor, Black Widow, Red Skull. You bastard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't say anything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He also plays Black Widow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a whole new weird arc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Black Widows, woo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the episode of TableTop that I did just dropped today, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go check that out. Watch Laura go and destroy a bunch of folks on another game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. A very scary horror RPG.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that sounds awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is there anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have something, but you're next.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There's this douchebag called fouseyTUBE that we were parodying, and we think it's funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But yeah, that just came out a couple days ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I should have done this a couple of weeks ago, but Transformers: Robots in Disguise is now on the telly, and I play a Decepticon named Underbite, who eats everything. It's a really well done show, and Decepticons are better than Autobots, and check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're villains on everything, are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a lisp in that show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives good villain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not on this show. What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.There you go. Also I have the pleasure today to announce that I am the voice of Tim Drake, Robin, in Arkham Knight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm excited about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tim Drake!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That game looks boring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check it out. Anyway! So, into the game. Let me go ahead and get the music going because I think that's a required aspect of this as far as I'm concerned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm always nervous in the first five minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You remember how to play?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog being dominated and Grog-napped by the surviving queen, duergar Queen Ulara.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Everybody needs a nap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to have to get one of those child leashes for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can get a chip implanted in him so we can track him all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, like a dog chip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So get on enchanting that, Tiberius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like chips.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Or like one of those tiles you put on your keys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. That's actually not a bad idea. Can we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an app for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A Grog-jack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, you can make that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog-jack? Whenever he gets taken, it gives a little beeper in your pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You managed to make your way across this bone field and discover what appears to be a camp, across a number of pillars in the distance. Vax went ahead and stealthed up, looked over and saw that there was a camp of duergar, and apparently the surviving Queen Ulara giving them orders. Next to Grog, who is currently bolted by iron bands to some sort of a cart that they've been dragging him through this tunnel passage with. And that is where we have left off. So.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I've got a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Because I did, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I want to hear yours. Let's do them both without telling, and just see what happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll Roshambo you for it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I actually-- I actually like this idea, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth can meld through rock. So, if we can get the attention of everyone who's guarding Grog, she could slip through while we're drawing them out, and get through and let him go in the midst of the fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That works with my plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That works with your plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My plan was to-- was to go in there and distract them while you did something! (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect plan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hadn't completed the thought because the something hadn't been worked out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were 80% there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually, let me tell you all that Grog is up here, you didn't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assumed you'd come back by now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm still up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That raises the stakes! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last week I said, "Come up now." And that's when he called it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I had already taken off. So I'm already headed there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he's at least said, "Come up now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're... we're there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Tiberius, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great... Great, Tiberius, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Hold on, let me show you my collection of tin cans tied to my tail."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, you know what? No, I'm fine, I'll just roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, roll the shit out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Okay. So, as Tiberius coasts up along the back portion of Vax's arrival point...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Where is everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) We're on our way.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (whispering) I don't know. I heard you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice one of the duergar looks over his shoulder in your direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And plan over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And begins to make a few steps in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Who? You?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he went in anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and he's not stealthed enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I grab Tiberius by the snout and pull him back, around the edge of that rock. I'm just doing it. Pulling my dagger out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the duergar continues to move forward towards the edge of the rock...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, come up here please...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Okay!" We stealth. Can I head that way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm throwing a knife into the dwarf's neck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus! That's not very stealthy at all!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's coming over!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the rest of you guys go ahead and roll stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's not waiting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been doing this for 30 seconds. We're already in a fight! I was going to distract them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to stand here and wait for the duergar to walk around the corner.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was going to distract them, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And... you got one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a classic movie moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going in. I'm walking into the camp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Wait, okay, wait. Are we abandoning the plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're just going for it right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the rest of you...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a nine, so it doesn't even matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a ten, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the rest of you begin trudging in, down this tunnel, towards the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota and Kima are... (laughs) holding up the back rear end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, if you wait five minutes, I can at least take one out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Scanlan approaches, the duergar immediately turns around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, duergar!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right up behind him-- (surprise sound effect) Cut his neck, cut the throat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right,simultaneously, as you approach, the duergar looks behind, gives you a glance, and you can see his eyes, normally pupil-less eyes of the ashy-skinned duergar are now glowing with an odd dull green color that you haven't seen in duergar previously, and he starts rushing towards you. He's going to make a simultaneous round rushing up to you for an attack while you release your two attacks against him and you release your dagger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, twinsies!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who hits Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This calls for a music change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) Well, the best laid plans....

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My first one was an ultimate fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, the first duergar swings at you with his war hammer. To you Scanlan, that comes down with a 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12 versus armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Versus your armor class, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, though the duergar are relatively small, you're much smaller, and as a gnome you slip right out of the path of the actual hammer blow. Your first arrow misses, second one you said hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 definitively hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, why? Why? Oh, I'm cursed today! Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Him not even aware of your presence, currently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First of the night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a magnet inside this die. I should be-- Just full disclosure. Okay, so natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We're buying you new dice next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Will you buy me new dice as well? Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So! As you pull Tiberius back, clutching the front of his snout, keeping him quiet, you pull a dagger out, toss it in the air, catch it and fling it at full speed, striking true. Go ahead and roll damage. With sneak attack bonus. Also multiplied because of the crit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mumbles numbers) 47.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. As he turns and the arrow strikes off his shoulder and he glares at you, Vex. He pulls back his hammer again looking down at Scanlan, coming down for a blow to basically bash his skull in, but he stops suddenly, as you see this blade protrude from the front of his skull. His glowing eyes fade back to a dull, pale whitish color, and his body slumps onto the ground as your dagger magically returns to your hand from below. Duergar down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nod to you. Good job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I step forward and say-- is her name Ulara?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulara. Queen Ulara.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Queen Ulara. Show yourself! Step out and talk to us. Everyone hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rest of you, are you all staying where you are? Are you coming forward with Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you're talking? We're doing a talking thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's step up behind him. I want to step up and make him look more imposing with me and Trinket behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am-- I am going-- Hang on, wait, what are you do-- what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to step up behind Scanlan with a bear behind him, and make him look more imposing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to... slink back into the shadows and turn into an earth elemental, and sink into the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And hopefully they don't see that happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth... is no longer Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Whoa, you're huge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then-- (swoosh sound effects) fades underneath the earth somewhere. Just slips into it, almost like sand through an hourglass, you just vanish beneath the surface of the rock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great way to leave a party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima steps forward, making a point to step angrily onto the corpse of the duergar. You hear the crunching of bone and metal as she steps over his corpse. Percy, you're approaching as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm... staying a little bit back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so about there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, about there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Clarota's going to move off to the side... here, and Pike is going to come and get the center point she feels the most applicable to heal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where on the map is the queen right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't see her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in the tent. She's in the tent, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, which is right over here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see what's going on and I rub my ring and I go invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Greater Invisibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Tiberius also vanishes from view. You glance over your shoulder, Vax, and notice that Tiberius is just gone. Just (whoosh) vanished. All right. So. As you shouted this out, the secondary duergar now turns and... First off, make a persuasion check. Well, no, in this case intimidation, I think, is what this is going to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say okay, because it is a different skill, so yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Matt, I'd like to move to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get about there with this round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking love this game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dwarf comes and flanks her on this side, and you now see-- while I cannot seem to find the figure for the life of me right now to represent it. We'll use this, for the time being. There is an elf also flanking her. Normal looking elf, dressed in what looks like a fine chainmail attire. Longsword at the side. So there's an elf and a dwarf, both flanking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they're clearly with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are at her side, like they're ready to defend her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They could be charmed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Queen Ulara, if I may have a word. Let us spare each other lots of bloodshed and just have a chat before we fight. Is that all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Talk, small annoying creature, and perhaps it'll delay the inevitable."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My friends and I have come--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The normal world, let's say, to your fine kingdom down here below. And we were on a mission. We're a bit of-- I don't want to brag, but we're a bit of an elite task force, sent in by kingdoms and kings that you probably haven't heard of way down below, but anyway. I'll spare you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold that thought just for a second. Percy, go ahead and roll a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.... When it's out of the blue like that it's always bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. DM. Vax is creeping along the back of that tent and curving around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to do the earring and go to Scanlan and be like, "Keep it simple, will you? I "mean, really, calm down."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Copy that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how could you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My lady, we have come on a mission. To save someone that you were holding captive. We have completed our mission, and in the melee, in that hovel you called a palace back there, we lost one of our own, and we would like him back. Now, I'll make it very simple because my fellows are begging me to keep things simple. It's a simple binary choice. You can all die right now, or you can turn over our friend and we will probably, probably leave you in peace. I would promise, but I don't make promises to dogs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Ooh! Oh snap!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit! I move in behind where the pillar is, but in the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind where this pillar is, in the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm-- yeah, I'm there-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, Percy, go ahead and roll an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll die once I finally come back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your saving throw for intelligence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Small square near the top upper left hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least I don't have to roll for intelligence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll for Trinket, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do. Okay. Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket falls to the ground with this horrible (bear groan) sound, digging his nose into the actual dirt to try and find a way to escape this piercing mental agony, this psychic damage...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty shitty, you guys. It sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys take 22 points of psychic damage, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. Trinket's about to die again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's all stunned?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Laura, twice.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Bear and Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike also.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, I'm throwing a dagger at the queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Now we roll initiative, folks, because stuff has begun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (fumbling) Can I do something right before that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, essentially this triggers the combat now. This was an immediate occurrence. Now we're going into initiative order.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, by my saying that, do I get into the initiative order, or does my action come out, my decision come out before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say for the two that didn't act this turn, you guys can have advantage on the initiative roll because you guys have been holding your actions. So Tiberius, you can also have advantage on your initiative roll, since you guys were holding off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice, that's better!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's way better than a two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't roll anything because I'm stunned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are stunned currently. You still roll initiative so we have the order that you go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh are we doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on like Tron.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, hang on. So 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right, wow. We got some good initiative rolls, guys, good job!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16 here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, me. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You play stunned well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not a victim. I'm going to kick butt as soon as I wake up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Kima also fell stunned to that, unfortunately. All right, that brings us to.... I think that's everyone's initiative, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, top of the round. Percy, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need earth elemental stats if you know where they are, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, did you not print them out? Monster Manual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Monster Manual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here we go. (funny accent) See, this comes in handy more often than you'd think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. But while we're looking that up, I'm basically going to pull my gun, I'm going to fire four times into the face of that awful, awful screaming bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of the, the mind flayer over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the mind flayer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you whip around, he's there in your face, go ahead and make-- You're using your action surge to fire two additional times, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, wow, four rounds. Go for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First attack with Pepperbox is 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Unfortunately misses. Form shifts (whooshing sounds), and you can feel the psychic energy of its oppressive mental force, causing your hand to miss its aim with each pull of the trigger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right fire shot for 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my fire shot... so that's...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put it on him, Percy, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, this sucks! Eight points of damage. What is this about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Third attack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spin the barrel again on the Pepperbox (gunshot).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get on it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Murder him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That's doubled with the critical?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 2d10. I double the dice, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or roll and double the dice number, but that's fine. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11, that doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately. So the first one hits, the second one actually clips part of its chest and you can see, as it tries to use its psychic abilities to resist the bullet, it still pierces its chest in the side. Missing everything vital, still causing it to (makes painful hissing sound), sucks in the air for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a terrible roll. I'm going to use some movement to dodge left to get out of the way of that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So going this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go... Yeah, about there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. Probably should get out the laser pointers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bring him one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, is Grog stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog's been hitting the peace pipe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys don't know; you haven't seen him yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's in iron bands held on a cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's awake, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, on a cart. You haven't checked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Iron bands?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's tied down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's on the whole cart though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius. You're up next.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Great. I peek over the little thing, and I go, "Ooh!" and I throw a fireball from my ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay, where are you throwing it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, right in the juicy spot of those three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. As they're all sitting there, looking ready to pounce for this series of battle, all of a sudden there's a slight streak of reddish energy in the distance as you all are watching. It looks almost like the fire pit behind them just explodes in this giant fiery ball of red, angry magical fury. So go ahead and roll your 8d6 damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (mumbling numbers) I'm missing d6s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's two more.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful. (mumbles) That's... 31 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 points of damage, okay. Queen Ulara you notice, as the duergar are generally considered-- as this blasts in this area as well-- both her and the duergar make their saving throw; they have magic resistance innately against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Against magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dwarf takes the brunt of it as well. Appears to still be alive, but looks very horribly burned and is looking at its hands now like (pained grunting sound). Barely standing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then I spend two sorcerer points to (crackling sound effect) form an ice knife.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get to that point, Grog, you also take that damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. How many points?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a freaking sponge. He'll be fine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you said you threw it in the fire, there? Grog's right there. On a cart.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I said the juicy spot of those three! I knew Grog was there. Of course I wouldn't throw it there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can take it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I pointed here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, but... I thought-- I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be specific next time! But yeah, that's okay. He can take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're down all of our laser pointers.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I throw that, right in the back of Queeny's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, go for it. So as you coalesce this arcane energy into this blue, cold, freezing plume of... moisture in your hand, it forms into this giant jagged blade of ice, and you chuck it in a straight line. Go ahead and roll a d20 plus your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it. Get some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit, even with her mage armor.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet. And then that's 1d10. So that's a ten. And then... it (exploding sound effect) shatters, and then does-- where the fuck is it-- 2d6 damage as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, to her and everyone-- Go for it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In a five-foot radius. So yeah...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And that guy's like right next to her, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Hey, Matt. How much damage did I take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the damage on the fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31? 31 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool, and that's four points of damage to both of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To both of them? All right. Well, for one, four damage is enough, as the shards of ice from the back of Ulara's torso explode into this spray of jagged ice chunks. It pierces continuously the right side of this dwarf, who then falls to the ground, grasping at his wounds and trying to stand to his feet before falling over unconscious right there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I have Greater Invisibility, so I'm still invisible and I just peek back behind the rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Mysterious fireball, ice dagger source. Okay. You come to consciousness, in extreme pain as your entire body is immersed briefly in flame.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (painful roaring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in a second. Vex. Vax, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: three, four, five-- I still can't see her-- six, maybe... seven, eight, nine, ten. Stop right here by Clarota. (over enunciating) Clarota-- Clarota! And dagger, dagger at this jerkface over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was stealthed, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so stealth is 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he hasn't gone yet, so for the assassinate feat for rogues, if he hasn't gone yet, this is a critical hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, combat already began when he attacked the rest of your party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Combat's begun. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The feat says if you have the jump, if you go before the person's gone, but we can talk about that later...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but they've already attacked half your party with the mind blast, so in theory the battle's already begun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Okay, so keen dagger flying through the air...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't hit to-- Okay, so that hits. 16 plus-- 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitively hits, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so three... plus (mumbles)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muttering numbers) 36 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36 points of damage. All right. So, the mind flayer, which is... After it finishes a mind blast, you can see it beginning to eye what its next target would be. As Percy goes running off to the side, it looks over at its three freshly-stunned prey and begins to lumber towards what looks to be either Pike or Vex. But before it gets a chance to advance though, (whistling sound) out of nowhere your dagger (impact sound) pierces it in its shoulder. It looks at it and it grasps for it. As its hand tries to pull the dagger out, the dagger disappears in a plume of black shadow energy back into your hand as you throw the other dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, asswipe! Okay, that is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does also hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that is eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The other dagger, the creature actually puts up a little bit of a psychic field for a second and it stops its momentum. It does still manage to strike it, but with nowhere near the damage you were hoping it would. Cool, that ends your turn. That brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so all that's remaining on the battlefield is the queen and the mind flayer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mind flayer, the queen, and this duergar here that has not acted yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. (sighs) I'm going to just bum rush the queen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! I mean...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And just dive at her. Just dive full, head-on, straight for her and bear hug her with Banishment.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yeah, baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You know you can cast that from a distance?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you have to-- it's touch.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it? Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a touch spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. What's your spell DC? I assume you're using your hand cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do most things through that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you charge forward, you pull out your enchanted hand cone and shout the incantation towards her with an angry glare.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, get lost, motherfucker! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It had a DC of 19 for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, even with her spell resistance, she does not resist it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it an intelligence or wisdom save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I don't know things. Target, plane of existence, banishment... I don't know. Where does it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should say what saving throw it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will do this for you. On a charisma saving throw or be banished. So, if it was on anything but a charisma saving throw, she would have shrugged it. Charisma, she does not have in spades. As you reach out, she pulls back and you see her beginning to form this crackling bolt of energy you've seen once before in the throne room that shot out and hit multiple members of your party once for a severe amount of damage. This would have been a very dangerous round if you hadn't connected with her right in front of her clavicle. She looks at you with this look of confusion and completely caught-off-guard frustration before her entire form (sucking sound) blinks out of existence and is no longer visible on the board.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bard ass!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the hell out of there (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to give inspiration to Grog because he needs it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Grog, as the flames die down, you look over and watch Scanlan rush up and completely, as far as you know, disintegrate the duergar queen who took you and has been torturing you these past few days--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, he looks over to you and gives you a little wink and a smile. Go ahead and take an inspiration dice, which for him is now a d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An upgrade!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heck yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can add that inspiration die to any ability checks, any skill checks, saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For instance, busting through iron bars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to go ahead and attempt to make her saving throw. Does not make it. Still somewhere in some other plane that you're unaware of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in a better place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to phase through the ground because I can. And pop up right there next to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (crashing sound) Grog, you, all of sudden, as you look over from Scanlan with this smiling face, this giant mountain of rock and earth just lumbers up out of the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Oh shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And in rock speak, I say, "Grog it's okay. It's Keyleth"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear (makes deep gargled sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams in terror)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still don't really grasp that you can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your first time doing elemental form; you're still trying to figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seeing that he's still tied up, I'm going to pick up the whole crate and put him over my-- no I'm going to football carry him like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he on something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's strapped to a giant cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's carrying the whole thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because earth elemental.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're there, now you still have about-- what's the speed of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. So you've got about, say, ten more squares, or I'm sorry ten more feet you can go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to start football rushing that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way? All right, one, two, all right there we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get the fuck out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now being carried by this giant lumbering earth elemental that is just bringing you under its arm. Great! Vex? Do you make your saving throw? Intelligence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intelligence saving throw, that should be at the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Using your mind, you shrug off the remainder of the ability. That does end your turn, but you're no longer stunned, which is nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great, that's the end of my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll it for Trinket too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, Trinket as well, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't think he got it. No, he still rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so Trinket's still on the ground, slowly digging his nose into the dirt, trying to find a way to his--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Does that mean he takes more damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No more damage, but currently is unable to function.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's dreaming of honey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. He's dreaming of pain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to this duergar, who's going to rush over to the one who just banished his queen and attempt to-- his physical form begins to swell with strength and frustration. The duergar swings at you with his war pick. That is...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "(singing) Oh, don't hit me!" I cast a little count, cutting-- what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cutting Words?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cutting Words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So it's a 16. Go ahead and roll your d10 number. It's a d10 now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a d10 now. You leveled up, yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even-- I've never rolled a d10 before! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you have!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so it's a 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a four, so it takes that down from a 16 to a 12, which does miss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He misses! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as he rushes towards you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) No, don't hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops for a second, confused. He puts the war pick down for a second like, "Wait-- argh! "(groans) You gnome!" Doesn't know why he listened to you and is equally frustrated with himself now as he is you. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the illithid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota, however, is going to go ahead and turn this way. Coalesce a giant ball of electrical energy into his hand, and release an arcing blast of lightning energy towards this mind flayer, who does make its saving throw. However, it's still a nice 8d6 lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they know each other? Are they friends?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Soulmates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that guy dated Clarota's ex-girlfriend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to the top of the round. The mind flayer looks at its certain circumstance. Puts its hands together like this, it seems to concentrate...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see it, I cast Counterspell! (fwoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, it's a reflex. Counterspell in this edition is so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so... this would be Counterspell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on Tibs. Tibber-hoods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Counterspell, so make an ability check, so add a d20 plus five to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nothing, that's no numbers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, there we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good number.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is that? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? That'll do it. So as this entity you've seen before, they tend to like create this small localized portal into some other plane, and then like step through and vanish. You see it begins to coalesce the same arcane energy, and for a moment you see a spark of some sort of door beginning to open. As Tiberius steps from behind the rock, releases this torrent of sparkling arcane energy that closes the gate entirely and the mind flayer for a second looks confused before it, across the way to wherever it came from and sees nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you still invisible?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So sad, so sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is going to turn tail and run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) Just running?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With his feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I shoot him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He ran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah essentially levitating away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he have a goofy run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more, its a gliding. it's a (whoosh) About five or six inches off the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shoot her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shoot him, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take a step towards-- who's buggering Scanlan over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A duergar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a duergar? I'm just going to take a shot at him really quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not going to hit you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to see him right now; there's a big tent in the way, if you want to take a step forward, continue moving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a step forward, I'm going to continue moving, this is going to be a running shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you turn, pull your gun off to the side, (explosion) offhand fire--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like guns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- don't go anywhere. That's nine damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to shoot again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. That also hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight damage. Bad News has not come out yet! This is just my little Pepperbox.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The duergar which was attacking you-- you see part of it's still burnt from the fireball which was tossed the first round-- he's frustrated and angry that you caused him to somehow lower his guard when he attacked you last.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him gearing up for another two-handed strike down at this tiny gnome character in front of him. The first blow hits the war pick, knocking it out of his hands. He looks over, confused, at you as the second blast hits him right in the side of the face, completely destroying this side of his head entirely. This wet gurgle as the duergar slumps to the ground, almost on top of you, but you step out of the way as his body (boof) hits the ground right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. Nice, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where does he get such wonderful toys?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Percy's turn. Tiberius?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to chase them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to slink my way all the way behind the other rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Towards everybody, closer. Yeah, back, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where do you think you're going? (fwoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you fire this beam over here, it detonates in the distance, safely far enough away from the party. Go ahead and roll damage for that fireball. As the mind flayer that is drifting away glances over its shoulder, you see its greenish glowing eyes go wide for a second, cartoon-style, "oh, shit!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you go, "Fireball!" as you do it? Hadouken!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, with its advantage against the spell-- it's a dexterity save, correct?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, so that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, all right, 19 damage?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as the mind flayer's drifting away, you guys see this arc of red, beaming energy (whoosh) off in the distance. (explosion) You see rocks cascade off the top of the wall, hitting the ground with a force as the entire tunnel shakes and rocks. As the smoke and the flames dissipate, all you see is this pile of blackened creature on the ground from where the mind flayer once stood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, peace out! Mind gobbler.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that everybody's?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fellows! Gather around. She might come back at any moment and we should be here to surround her when she comes back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And someone get Grog out of that thing!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, crap, I forgot about that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, how do we get Grog out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they're all doing this, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, am I still chained up to the cart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, these iron bands are across your entire body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Being carried by an earth elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse me, giant rock thing. Could you perhaps get me out of this shit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start hiking back towards Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike and Trinket, are they still stunned, or are they... better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've shrugged it off by now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I run over and try to see what I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulara still can't make her saving throw for the life of her, even with resistance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go try to mess with the things on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. As you guys approach, and begin making your way up to the front here, grab these duergar.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'll move on the other side of that rock so I can see better and have line of sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, on that side, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so. As the rest of you all slowly trudge up and gather around this vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! Are you hurt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't tell yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping my distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still in this wonderful therapeutic chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and you try and pull the bars off? Is that what you're doing? What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're iron bands that surround you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't want to hurt him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's a wooden cart? Is it a wooden cart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe bust the wood on the bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or just smash the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he can pick a lock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's what I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is there a lock on the bars? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's an intricate lock mechanism.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try that first before I suplex Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, so the earth elemental lumbers forth and presents the cart on the ground in front of you (impact sound). One of the wheels (breaking noise).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cracks a little bit in the process.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Give me a little space. Let me look at this." Can I detect traps on his bands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Checking for traps?! She could come back at any second, hurry up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep my arrow notched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In case she does come back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They appear to be just general locks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are there locks contraptions on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a lock on them, yes. So go ahead and make your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. (tink) The band that's part way across the waist opens freely on the hinge on the one side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was there just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was the one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans in relief) Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and make an athletics check. I mean, there's multiple bands around you. Across your shoulders, your torso, your legs, your ankles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move on to the next one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a 25 on my lock pick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you get a second band. You rolled a 25? And Marisha, do you want to go ahead and make an athletics check as well? Or that would be a strength check for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your form, your elemental form, to try and pull the bands off of Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you want to do something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to recommend to Pike that she do a bit of healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Pike! Can you heal Trinket. He's really almost dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Pike okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike comes over and spends a 3rd-level healing spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I failed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You failed what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Life. Oh wow! Yeah, you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Trinket heals 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is moving to the next band. That's a 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a 25, does that not help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, between the two of you, over the next few seconds or so, you pick the next one and with that remaining push, you force the rest of the bands off. Grog, you make your way up to your feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans in relief)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go! At that point in time, there's a slight ripple in the space right before this fire pit, and in that place Ulara, Queen Ulara, reappears again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been waiting for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I grab her?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, can I do something? Can we react to this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see it and I cast Hold Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. As you finish the spell, you can see this glow of yellowish holding energy, almost like these mystical shackles, begin to tighten around her and then fade, unaffected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I release an arrow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also cast Hold Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll for your attack. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29? Okay, that does hit. You can see now, the second set of shackles spins around her, she brings her hand up like this and they just scatter around her, resisting a second Hold Person. Now all her saving throws are coming through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just grab her as an earth elemental. Just like (mumbles with a deep voice).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, damage on the attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Hunter's Mark her, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh there you go. See that, chatroom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that? 13?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12! Plus... That's 16 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a headshot with Bad News.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, are you doing something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to talk to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bear hug her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Athletics, I don't have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's better! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You bound up behind her and as she looks over her shoulder, the arrow piercing her shoulder. She's looking pretty rough, you can see the blood beginning to pool underneath her robe there. Her eyes go wide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be in your best interest to not struggle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the giant arms go (impact noise) behind her and the earth elemental lifts her off her feet. (groans in pain) You can see her now, her feet dangling angrily in the air. A couple of seconds pass before she, "(pants) All right. So, let's make a deal, shall we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) You're in no place to negotiate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have everything that we have come here for. What can you possibly offer us that we don't already have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Valid point. What purpose do I serve? You should let me go."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let you go?! I tried to talk to you and you almost tried to get us killed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina, our purposes here are done, but Lady Kima, she has further to go, and I am curious, your Highness, if you know anything about this K'Varn chap or gal or thing? We have heard his or her name. They seem to be famous in these parts. I was wondering if you know anything about K'Varn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you rolling Persuasion for this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am. So well. That's a two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "I know many things." And she leans forward a little bit and then spits right in your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Wonderful. Clarota, do you want to suck her mind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tighten my grip on her a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex'ahlia, would you come up and talk to this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm already here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota, at which steps forward and brings his hand up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's true. We don't need her, we just need her brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Clarota steps forward, putting his hand out, this voice echoes through all of your minds communally. "Now... tell us what you know." And you see his eyes flicker with a strange blue energy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Professor X.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man's got to eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Liberation from physical limitation. Liberation from the pain of the light." And she looks up as she says that. "We all shall rise. K'Varn, the Guiding Darkness. The sun shall hold no sway and "we shall walk the surface once again."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is all this poppycock?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is K'Varn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "K'Varn came to us, showed us how through unification we could be better than we ever were."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't ask what he did, I asked what he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her jaw falls slack for a second and this voice comes through. "Ah, there! (chuckles) There we "are. I can see you all so clearly."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'd be surprised, dragonborn." (all gasp)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Word has reached my ears, but to see you, to look upon you, is everything. Come. You are "close, yes? Come to me, as my guests. I invite you. The temple doors are open. I'd like to see "you in person."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (stammers) Can you be more specific? Like, do we go left, or right, or... specific.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're already on the right path. Come to me. You are my treasured guests." At which point, the blackness in the eyes begins to intensify and begin to spill like black tears from the face. Her body shudders before the back convulses, and then falls limp, a little bit of smoke rising from the mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I check her pulse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has definitely given up the ghost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try to heal her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she have anything awesome on that we can take?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't going to say it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're looting her already?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was waiting for someone else to say it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a mercenary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she dead? Can we take her outfit? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys glance around you find-- other than the usual assortment of objects you find are the armor the duergar, the Emberhold, make.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax'ildan is going to go pick at the charred remains of the illithid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going into the tent to look.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I want to check out the queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you inspect her body, as the earth elemental drops her (boof) with a thud to the ground--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I rolled an 18 for arcana, and you know I wanted to check for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do notice there's a silver circlet across her forehead that does give off a magical aura. She carries on her one viscous, reddish potion that is familiar to you in the healing accoutrement of various potions you've had in the past. It is a potion of greater healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and we haven't used the yellow potion yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And nobody ever drank that?

lines.name: ORION, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is another potion that has almost a blue, frosty color to it as you take the vial from where it sits in the rest. The actual glass that contains the liquid has a layer of frost crystals around it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to remember that you're the one who suggests drinking random, yellow liquids and I'm going to bring you a vial of yellow liquid. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me? Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I also check-- We already checked the queen? You already checked the queen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's almost done with checking the queen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we check the elf and the dwarf that we knocked out, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And can I ask Pike to heal me, because I look like a game of tic-tac-toe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we should check on Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no, don't think of me, please. I've only been fucking missing for two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're standing up? I'm so happy you're back with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll on investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay. You can't seem to find anything out of the remains of the mind flayer, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop my earth elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (shoomf) The earth around your form seems to crumble, like a layer of rock. It hits the ground and dissolves into the stone beneath you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? I told you it was Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were you watching, Grog? Grog, you weren't watching.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, totally was. It was amazing what you did. Could you do it again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After we take a short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything in the tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one filled vial. A very large vial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Superior healing. All right. Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you find--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Can you fucking heal me, please? Can you please heal me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the hell?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I place the circlet on my head.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably a cursed item.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't have it with an Ioun Stone either, by the way. It's one or the other.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (stammering) I thought that was a...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a head slot.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And for Ioun Stones I can have up to three in the head slot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe give it to Scanlan. Scanlan, do you have anything in your head slot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Just my cunning wit!" I don't even know what a head slot is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's where a hat goes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: put it on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, can you share?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This essentially allows me to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone who wears it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (stammering) Anyone who wears it can maintain two concentration spells for two rounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's great for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's great for a lot of people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you do that cheer where I feel a lot better after you do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches out and touches you and this warmth fills-- this warmth fills your torso. Using her Lay On Hands ability, Lady Kima of Vord heals you for 38 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I find anything on the other people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look through the bodies. It looks like most of their adornments, other than the natural armor and weapons they have, nothing of particular interest. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, I get to go twice because it's Underdark. That was great. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, after Kima finishes healing you, Kima walks over to the dwarf corpse as you're inspecting it and gives it a look-over and shakes her head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you see, Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "This was one of my companions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, judging by the scars across his body, he had already been made a thrall of one of the "illithid. Most likely the one that we finished back there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Killed her friend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was already a thrall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There wasn't much to really bring him back at this point, I fear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what they would've done to Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you guys all look at Grog now, you can see him, he has hundreds upon hundreds of small scars across his body: fresh wounds that have just barely sealed. It looks like they've done a number on him with a bunch of small blades, hooks, razors-- it's hard to tell. But he is coated with small cuts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look really manly now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Have we done some healing? Has healing been done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can short rest if you want to heal yourselves with your hit dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the time for an intermission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it? What time is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's only just begun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) We've only just begun. (speaking) Because we went right into battle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanted to talk to my team. Can we talk now or talk after break? It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's talk now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is walking off into the distance to urinate on a stalagmite or stalactite, whatever's the one on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we'll wait for Vax to get back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll bring him up to speed later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just talk loudly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I don't-- Where's Kima?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's with you. Kima's still looking over the body of the dwarf that's fallen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speak!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a relief! Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Do you not want to talk in front of Kima?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) I don't want to talk in front of Kima. (speaking) Kima? Earmuffs, Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's awkward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want me to distract her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the longest pee ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll distract her! I'll distract Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog goes and distracts Kima.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might be better at that. Kima, can you take a walk with me? I would like to persuade you to take a walk with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll persuasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Kima gives you a concerned look and goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's this thing on my body. I thought maybe you could take a look at it and you could tell me if it's good or bad? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh dear. No, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, do not drop the mack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the two of you begin to walk away for a moment, away from the party. Briefly, while the rest of you are left behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, do you have an earring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an earring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so Scanlan can hear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use my Minor Illusion to create a purple third nipple on me that I show her and ask her if it's okay, or if it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, things are getting a little weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this normal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None of this is normal. At all."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just, I trust you. I feel like I know you. You know we had that thing back there and then Keyleth was yelling at you. What was that all about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're all under duress."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's girl talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're under a lot of duress. The more and more things-- people have emotions and I "understand that. It's all right." And she pulls the leather gloves off that are part of the full leather armor set and begins to inspect you. In the meantime, you guys can continue your discussion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should get out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we've got Grog. We've got Kima. We came here to find Kima. That was our mission. I don't trust her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found her, but we can't leave without her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm walking back from my pee and I've overheard this. "We were sent here to bring back Kima."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And now you want to abandon her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not going to come with us until we've killed this K'Varn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, what's your problem with Kima?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, look. She's been... She just gave me the wrong vibe, up front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, vibe. What did she do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's been very rude--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's been very tortured. Tortured, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. But look what happened. She's brought countless people down here, only to meet their end.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, none of those people are us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're stronger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know something we don't, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, all I know is that only a fool believes that his path is the most virtuous. See? And he's got an intelligence of six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to use my-- I would like to do a check on Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see her intentions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (squealing) Ooh, inside-the-group check! I love it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 14. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Sneaky, sneaky Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The whisper! The first whisper!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get on camera. Get on camera. Over here, over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whisper on camera. He used to do this all the time. When shit goes down and all of us can't know, he whispers. And he sticks his tongue in your ear a little bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's really nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't cheat, but I really want to listen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that shit about now I'm manly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are manly. I meant more manly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey everyone, buy a t-shirt! Subscribe to Geek & Sundry. Support Felicia Day.

lines.name: MATT
