lines.text: As you finish your statement as well, Keyleth, Clarota steps up and says, "I "wholeheartedly agree. She is unstable and cannot be trusted in her state."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on a second, that's unfair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has been a long road. Keyleth, I know you have had a hard time. We all have. I know we're miles below the surface of the world. But we're together. We are family. And everyone here is here for you as you have been for us. Now, I say we camp for the night inside this schmuck's tent. We stay here, we rest up, sleep on it, and see how we're all feeling in the morning. We're here for you, Keyleth, and we'll protect you as you have protected us. You've got a family with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (crying) How do we know we are doing the right thing? We've killed a lot of people, you guys. We've killed a lot of people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who in this world is without fault? Who hasn't made mistakes? We certainly all have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, we're keeping him, K'Varn, from killing even more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we know we're not just interfering with issues that aren't our own? We didn't know any of this until we came down here, and look she wants to take the horn. She wants the horn, and she wants to take it back herself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bottom line is, all of this insanity is going to bubble up to the surface if someone doesn't stop it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All those creatures that have been coming up, Keyleth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember, think back. It has already begun, and no one is here to stop it except for Vox Machina. Us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We promise, we will heed your warning, but we can't run. We will heed it, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got your back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We made a deal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we made a deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did make a deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I understand you, Clarota, and I'm on your side. I swear. But a lot of people-- there have been a lot of murderers who said they did the things that they did because their gods told them to do it. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be cautious, and we'll have you to protect us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I dissipate invisible, and I approach Keyleth. "Your Highness. By the honor of all "Stormwinds, I will let nothing happen to you. I swear it. I will fight until my death, and I have "ways, of course, to get us all out of here whenever I damn well please. Do not worry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just have a bad feeling. This horn can't make it back up to the surface. You guys have to promise me that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll keep the horn from leaving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She wants to take it back. Why? If it's that bad, why does she want it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is to live. There is more at stake right now, and we are the front line. We're the only ones who can stop it. Mistakes are all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The god in darkness will blot out the light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just hope we're not the darkness.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, do you need light? (fwoosh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ORION Oh, is that-- I'm sorry

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not sure what this is. I'm sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "There's one more thing I need you to look at, it's just..." I cast Polymorph on myself, giving myself a gigantic dick, and I slowly pull down my pants...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima immediately turns around and says, "Okay!" And walks back to the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did I say? You can't keep it in for two seconds. Not that I blame you! My god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we are all a little frayed. I think we need to rest. Let's set up camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima steps in at this point and says, "I agree. (sigh) We have quite a journey ahead of us." At which point, Clarota pipes up and says, "Indeed. We're not too far from Yug'Voril. Let us rest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kima. I... just wanted to apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What for?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I came across too harshly that night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her hand up and... in a matronly way. "It's honestly not a worry. War is stressful, "and all of us have been through a lot for this experience. I understand. I've been where you've "been, and it's not uncommon to question everything around you, and with good reason: that's what "keeps you alive. Were you to believe every person that crossed your path, you would not have made it "past your 15th season. I can assure you, as best as I can, that I mean the best for all of us. I "just know that if we don't do what we're here to do, far more people will suffer than the few I've "brought down here to protect me and for me to protect. I'm not asking for your trust. I'm just "asking for your patience."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can grant you that. Only if you promise to grant us respect in return, because I feel you were a little untrusting of what we were doing up front, which I once again understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You caught me at a rough time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, Scanlan, what is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this bulge down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's bedtime is what that is. All right, everyone, let's go ahead and find ourselves a rest." All right. So as everyone goes to camp for the evening we are going to go ahead and take a break. Potty break for folks. We'll be back here in about ten or so minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you un-Polymorph your tripod, for god's sake?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before we go to sleep, I cast a bunch of spells in stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by side-stepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done. We'll be giving out another one at 2,750. So 2,750 subscribers and someone else in the chat room will win another promo kit. So that's cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will be here every week, so subscribe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go for it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Also, the PayPal is working again, for donations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the 826 donation's working again. Yay! Let us begin. So after an evening's rest, taking your respective turns keeping watch, all of you come to consciousness once more. Clarota anxiously sits at the edge of the camping facility, looking deeper into the tunnel ahead, keeping his eyes peeled in the darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I check under my belt because the spell has worn off. And I'm back down to my normal one and a half inches. Which on a gnome is pretty big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Length! And girth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a square. Like a cube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, you guys eventually come to consciousness and finish cooking whatever bits of food you've managed to muster at this point in time in the Underdark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's doughnuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is doughnuts. Under-doughnuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Indian food, apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Under-Indian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, all of those who contributed to getting us food tonight, thank you so much.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota seems slightly impatient as everyone is waking up and goes, "Come! Ahead, we shall find "it's Yug'Voril."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beautiful city of secrets."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why so eager to get back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Without the colony, I serve no purpose. I am wandering, aimless. I wish to return to the "Elder Brain."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And to be fair, he was only thrown out once K'Varn took over the Elder Brain. Correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. They threw me out long before, for my gift." And you see a little spark of arcane blue filter out of his fingers in the air and then (poof). Small spark. "It is an abomination to my "people. I am considered anathema. But to save them! To save my city, then they shall have me "back a hero."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if they don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They will. I can sense it."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would think they would grant you a hero's welcome, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If not, you have a home with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Forward, we will find shrouded in the forest of fungus our destination. Come." It begins to drift down into the dark tunnel further below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We follow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we follow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I follow behind them and call out to him, "Are you using Levitation, or what? How are you-- "is this how you--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's how we get around, dragonborn."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His tentacles flicker at his face for a second. As you guys continue forward in silence, K'Varn seems to be more chatty than usual, almost like the proximity is-- this is excitement to him, instinctually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you mean Clarota? You said K'Varn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I meant Clarota.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slip of the tongue!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, "oh shit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, he slipped-of-the-tongue before and he screwed us over with a sneaky-sneaky!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Broken into creeds, we function rather "pleasantly." And he drifts forward again at full pace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm worried for him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worried for him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, for his effect on the group?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm worried that they won't take him back, what that will do to his state.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the bottom line is, (sighs) we have a pretty clear goal at hand. Everything else will have to be figured out afterward.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I still follow Clarota. I'm like, "So is it-- do you do it with your mind, or is it just "like-- were you all taught as a child to be able to levitate, because it seems--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's inherent, much like your gifts. It's just how we get around."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good to know. Understood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: K'Varn, the god in darkness. I want to wrack my brain to think if I've ever had any lessons or if that name has ever come up in any of my reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It'd be a history check. Like a super-super history check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: History check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A super history check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No whammies. That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? The name is as fresh to you as it was the day you heard it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fiddlesticks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over to Lady Kima and I say, "How's that that greatsword been treating you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks and she's using it almost like a stick in the dirt as she takes a step. "You know, "it's served its purpose so far, I just (sighs) I wish... I wish that vault wasn't lost. Leather isn't "my idea of defensive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you fancy a trade, Kima? I have elven chainmail, if that would help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could take that leather armor off your hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you'll be vulnerable, won't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, actually. The chainmail isn't right for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Stick figure... (laughs)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Stick figure! (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it! Got it. We're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps we'll find a more modest place to swap, but yes, I agree."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dang it, I should've done that before we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you a modest spot to change?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, are you skinning a boar over there? What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of you summon the stapler straw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Summon the staples!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, so. As you continue to press forward deeper into this tunnel network, the air begins to grow steadily colder and colder. The temperature, it's-- you begin to see your breath a little bit in the air.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Am I mistaken? You're really damaged still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We slept!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys all slept overnight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm up to full, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So, the scars are...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The scars are cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the visual scars are still there but he's at full hit points. They're healing slowly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't you fix these.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I notice, I go, "Anybody with (mumbling) knowledge of medicine should give a whack at "cleaning some of those."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you know what, though? Before we go any further, I remind Pike that Vax's foot damage needs daily repair, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Yes, of course!" She comes over and you guys take a slight break as Pike comes and sets you down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not pretty to look at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's seen it already, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I've seen worse."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what happened to your foot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It got melted off. Aw, come on, not again!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine, except the pinkie toe

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got a little pinkie nubbin!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pinky toe's a nubbin now, yeah

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, we could just take care of the whole thing right now, if you want.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, Grog, that defeats the purpose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No? Rash? ...all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need Percy to make me a replacement first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a little metal toe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, could you hook a brother up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly." She sets the foot down, she begins to gather up her runes, and she's casting a 4th-level spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She should've done it before we went to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aye, but alas, she's not here. Sorry, Ashley. So that would be the equivalent of about 32 hit points. She's also going to attempt a medicine roll, as well. Okay. You notice there is some progress that is slow, but some of the burn scarring from the dip in the magma is beginning to slowly subside. Fresh skin is beginning to show, but it's still pretty rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It still smells amazing, so if you could just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does smell amazing, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a weasel on your leg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota, are we planning on going to your village before we go see K'Varn, or are we going after K'Varn first? I'm confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "K'Varn resides within the city, the temple."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is he a mind flayer, then? I mean, is he like you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not seen him myself, since I was cast out before he took the star, took my people "under his spell."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to be clear, the temple of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We don't know its original purpose. The city we "acquired, we found, we took root. Yug'Voril existed long before our colony did."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That's good to know. That's very good to know. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begin to give that smooth inner cave look to the outsides of this tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Keyleth?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're walking. Are you all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm doing okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're here for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm here for you, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're having a discussion of how best to go about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While that happens, can I use my Primeval Awareness to sense if I sense any dragons in the city coming up in front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. As you're walking, the group slows with you, as you have to really maintain concentration on this. You close your eyes and you consider. You sense no sources of dragon within the radial of your ability to sense in this cavern structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are our feet leaving footprints?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Subtle ones, but yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Missed our little flower girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! So glad we have him back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to just put something out on the headsets really quickly. "When we get into the "city, I need everyone to promise that we're not going to enter the temple. No one rush in, no one "be brash. No one make a poor decision. We're going to wait. No matter what happens, don't enter the "temple until we've all had a moment to figure out what's happening."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one be a yahoo.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's a trap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's going to be a trap, it's going to be getting us into the temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants us. He wants us there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He literally invited us into the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So don't go to the temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We walk to the temple, we don't enter the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So enter the temple. Understood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Understood. Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, beginning to notice the tunnel itself, the cavern, is swaying back and forth a little bit with this. As opposed to a straight path, the tunnel is beginning to arc left and right. There's little pockets and crevices beginning to show at certain points, and you start seeing small bits of bluish crystal jutting in small pockets out of cracks in the rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say that there was mushrooms? A mushroom forest, a fungus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota yesterday mentioned a fungal forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we haven't seen it yet. But we're starting to go into the crystal caverns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starting to find bluish crystals, which Pike makes a motion. "Yes, I saw this in my vision, too!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I touch some of the crystals? Are they removable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dick move!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The greed! The greed gets me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You reach out and touch the crystal, and it's cold to the touch, as is most of the stone wall, and you can see there's condensation on it that gets on your fingers a bit. It's smooth, except for the jagged points where the natural formation juts out. You tug on the crystal a little bit, find if there's any place there that's moveable, and it's pretty solid in that rock wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it appear to be producing cold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the temperature doesn't seem different at all to the air. There doesn't seem to be a source at all; it's the same temperature as the rest of the tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to figure out what kind of crystal this may be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, these look like the crystals on your staff.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Hm? Oh, ooh, yes! They're pretty." I take out one of my daggers-- yes, I do have daggers-- and (clicking noise) I'm going to chip away a couple of chunks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, let's grab a few chunks. I may have an idea for later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 for my nature check? Not that great, it's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Throw a few into the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I will say, go ahead and make an Arcana check as well?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, yeah, okay. (mumbling) 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay. It's hard-pressed to find out where these crystals came from, what their source is, or if they naturally are here or if they're put there through some other means, but the crystals do have a very, very faint magical residual energy to them. Useless, almost. It's the equivalent of finding crumbs at the bottom of a cereal box. It's there. You can see at one point there was something magical about their presence or their creation, but it is long faded.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool. Sweet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you still want more of them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a few.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go Hong Kong Phooey on the wall of crystals with my axe and I just (snarling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is your prerogative, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't, but I have a fancy robe. And I put it in there and I bundle it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! If you had a stick, you could be a crystal hobo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A fancy bundle of crystals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also have a fancy Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the bag. It's all in the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a half an hour further down this tunnel, both Vax and Vex simultaneously notice a part of the wall to the left that is actually visibly cracked and what appears to be almost a narrow passage that juts off to the left. However, there is a large boulder, solid stone, that is wedged into this. Apparently blocking the passage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, we need you over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you possibly move this very large, very heavy boulder for us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, you as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need your help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to move the boulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I perception around it before we do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly! Go ahead and roll perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in the path?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a side path that's been blocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 for Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, did you see it?! It was there and it went like that! It was a 20 and then it went (squeaky noise) because it was on the side. But that's okay. 20 is what it ended up as.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like it was actually placed there intentionally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26? On the strength check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the strength check? So as you guys are explaining, "This seems to be a fairly--" You don't even get to finish your sentence before Grog goes-- grabs the boulder, gets underneath and, lifting with the knees, Atlas-style. Puts the weight on the back and (groans)--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "(singing) Push it, push it real good! Push it, "push it real good!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Push it, push it real good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a resounding (scraping sound) scraping sound and a large crack, some of the rocks that it's wedged in break off and tumble to the sides, and you get the boulder free and you're now clutching it on top of you. And it's very, very heavy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! I use my Mage Hand and I push it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lose your balance over the boulder as it's now shoved off of its axis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls behind you, slamming into the wall, blocking half the passage, the passage you guys were going down immediately. You can still pass it, you just have to walk around it. And you may have tweaked something in your back a little in the process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grog, how's your back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I roll over on my stomach and I ask Trinket to step on my back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Trinket, give him a massage. He's really good at it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I roll over and have Trinket step on my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket gets up, pushes on you with the bear claws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make biscuits, Trinket. Make biscuits on Grog's back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans in relief)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hear the cracks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look down the passageway that was opened up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. The passage is very, very thin. It can maybe fit you individually. It can barely fit Grog when you actually go through the passage proper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30 feet ahead of you, you can see the path continues for a little bit and then widens up into what looks like a small chamber. But you'd have to get closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it dangerous at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everywhere is dangerous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30, 35 feet back. So?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, it just looks like a chamber and it looks like a hallway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should investigate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just looks like a death trap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If this is a tomb, I'm going to be so pissed at the two of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, can you send a little light down that passageway?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, sure. You want to shoot an arrow for me, love?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax chases the arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just going to go down the hall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as the light-- the arrow shaft vibrantly bursts into bright, Tiberius-created light. It arcs slightly down the hallway. Only a 35-foot distance. It goes pretty quickly and then (sound of arrow embedding itself) into what looks like a piece of rock, actually wedging itself into a piece of rock before falling to the ground, chipping a chunk upon impact. As it hits, you can see it's a small, roundish, oval chamber. You can see what looks like small piles on the ground at the far end. Still hard to make out from this distance, but you are welcome to enter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I followed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You followed it in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled a 26 on stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You rush in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Follow up the arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear trap! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First thing you understand: the air smells faintly of ancient untouched dust and mildew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, what did we just let loose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance at the floor and notice what appear to be six long-dead bodies strewn across the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long-dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skeletal and covered in webs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's in there? Just Vax right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just now Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to check out the very first, the closest body to the exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, it's fine. They're dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were people who came down here long ago for whatever reason and the last destination was this small cavernous space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said they're covered in webs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are webs on them, but the webs themselves are small, natural spider.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Small, natural. So not Bilbo Baggins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do notice that each one of their skulls has a giant hole bored into the bone itself. Different places in the skull.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to start searching all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else want to do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make my way, as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought we were all following.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm staying outside with Trinket and Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys hang out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like Pike wouldn't want us to do too much damage to these bodies. I just feel like she wouldn't want us to disturb them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't give a shit about these bodies. I care about what they are carrying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, looking at it, you notice that they have been here for at least 200 years. Two of the bodies are male humans. There are two dwarven bodies: one male, one's female.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Armor. Look for armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One female gnome and one half-orc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait. What? (all laugh)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Half-orc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half-orc? Okay. Hang on. You listed all that off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspect the gnome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not even in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you enter the room. Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking at her, you find that most of these bodies have already been for the most part turned over and looted. Some of them have no armor. They're either in plain clothes or it looks like their bodies have been tossed and taken whatever was on them, off. You do find, buried in the dirt under the gnomish female what looks to be a pristine ruby. Worth probably quite a bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to do an arcana check of 22. Just on the pile of bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll get to you in just a second. You, as you're inspecting the bodies on the other side, you come across the dwarven male is still fully armored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually has a golden chainmail on and is clutching what looks like a metal maul. The rest of them have no armor and no weapons. But this one is still fully adorned. And you also notice that the female dwarven corpse, while devoid of any accoutrements, any coin purses, belts or anything, does have, hidden within the bony clavicle, what little bit of stretched dried skin is pulled against it, a pendant that is gleaming blue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab the pendant, and then I start-- this looks good for Pike, so I start taking the chainmail off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the pendant and you look at it. It has a very beautiful sapphire emblem and you rub the dust off of it and you look at it. And you recognize this emblem. This is the emblem that adorns House Thunderbrand of Kraghammer. You turn it over and on the back, there's an engraving on the back that says: "For Lorna, my love."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Didn't he say to bring back some stuff from the Underdark?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. This is what we need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That name sounds familiar, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, your magic guy said to bring back some magic stuff from the Underdark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the Value of Valor. Tremaine? Was that his name?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And that's what this is. Let me take it and do-- I'll use that arcana check on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the actual amulet itself does have a magical essence to it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think this will do for our friend back up on the surface. Or under surface.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amulet of the Shield.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (mumbling) This protective amulet of the shield ... adding plus five to your AC against that attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It protects you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It effectively acts as a Shield spell once per day. Once per short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once per day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once per rest.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice. It's like a magic shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a reaction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have to be able to use magic to use it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so. Who has low AC that could use it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I'm the only glass cannon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going over to the armor. You're getting the armor for Pike? All right, as you reach out and grab the golden chain mail on it, the cold air around the chainmail is noticeably piercingly cold to the touch. Make a constitution save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's why it's still-- Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a natural one

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this, Pike comes over to you, Kima runs over to you and they both take a look at you. Pike starts inspecting you, using her medicine. And Kima, they both look at each other, pass a few notes back and forth, and they both agree. "Well, it appears this dwarven individual, "when he came to his end, was not very happy and in doing so left a very strong curse behind on his "body." Look about to each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything okay in there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (wheezing) No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You are considered cursed, which means you have disadvantage on all your ability checks and attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're cursed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we get rid of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are spells like Remove Curse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet Pike has that spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remove Curse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's not here. I don't have her spell list.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could try it, hold on. Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you touch? What did you grab?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Armor. It was the armor, wasn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was that golden armor, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's leave the golden armor alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) I got this for you, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait a second. Ha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. Don't make him laugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. At which point, Kima steps forward and pushes everyone away for a second and concentrates. And she reaches up and grabs the holy symbol of Bahamut from underneath the front of the leather armor, because she still hasn't exchanged it with you. And it glows with this vibrant silver light and the light travels down her arm, to her hands, to her fingers, and she places it out and reaches towards the armor and as she touches it, she winces slightly, but you see this glowing dark furious anger, this face arise out of the armor, giving off this slight whispering howl sound (whispering howl) and then (poof) dissipate. As you see the divine energy begin to dissipate and glide off her hand, she reaches over and touches you with her hand, and the curse is lifted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that was easy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I looked over and realized that oh, she actually has that spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I grasp Kima by the hand and say, "That is one I owe you. That's one I owe you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a wink and says, "To be honest, I just really wanted the armor." And she pats you on the shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the golden chain off of the body, she (chuckles) she tells-- no, you're out of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need me to create a curtain for you to change behind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She finds a cranny in the room. She puts on the chain mail, replacing the leather armor she gives back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Damn it. I was trying to get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does give you the greatsword and then takes the maul from the corpse of this dwarf. But as she takes it from the body, she sits down and says a silent prayer. Clutches her symbol and as she does, she takes from one of her pouches a small bit of blessed water and tosses it across the body of the dwarf. Puts it back away and stands up. "All right. Shall we continue?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we leave the cavern, I give one of these to the dwarven bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swear you hear a slight shift in bone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In silence left behind in darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take the ruby, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, did you get that armor back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got that armor back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, can I have that armor? Can I have it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, sis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kima has it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she gave it back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she wore it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she gave it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She put the chain mail on, she gave you the leather armor back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give it, give it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's between you and her. I'm not taking armor off of her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, can I have that armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's holding it in her hands. "Certainly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Thanks." I go put it on. I don't know what it is. It's magic though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's whatever armor you gave her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, my armor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The armor that you gave for her to put on in the Emberhold when she had nothing on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gave it to him, he gave it to her. And you're taking it? Hey, hey, hold on a second!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too late. Let's just keep moving, all right? Let's just keep moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we need to roll a brother sister contest die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we should just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's mine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow ow! Come on. I need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Squeezing her earlobe really hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you two roll. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. (yelling) Aha! It's mine, it's mine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Sibling justice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion versus persuasion? Is this what this was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure it was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They played arm punch until one caved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) It's mine, it's mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, what does it do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not fucking-- Figure it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'll just add a bunch of stuff to my stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep talking over each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you just having party arguments right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently. As you guys head back into the cavern, you move around the boulder that Grog had moved from the side crevice. And as you continue for about another 20 or 30 minutes, some of you begin to pick up what sounds like the distant lapping of waves against a shore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's never good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wave noises) As the tunnel begins to curve larger and larger, eventually you come around a bend and the tunnel opens up into a humongous cavern housing an underground lake circling a large island. From what you can see on the edges of the walls that are closest to you as the island disappears into darkness about a hundred feet ahead of you, there are these blue crystals that you've seen throughout this tunnel completely covering the walls of this entire cavern. There is only maybe bits of and places around the wall, about five, ten feet across where there will be no crystal. Otherwise it's just grey stone and blue crystal jutting from the sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over to one of the crystal walls and I put my hand on the crystal and I cast Daylight, trying to see if I can emanate it up through the dome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cast Daylight and on the actual crystal source that you cast it on, daylight emanates from it and gives a bright beacon of light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want it to light up the crystal. Trying to see how far I can get it to reach up to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You notice that from the whatever crystal vein structure some of these are connected by, some of them tend to glow in spots, but you see it's localized. All this crystal isn't interconnected, is what this tells you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are pockets here and there that are interconnected, but there are multiple veins of it going through the entire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What kind of liquid is this lake made of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's clear. The smell is a little musty, but not too bad. And you approach, and you can see there's just these very gentle, very soft waves that occasionally lap up on the shore, but only a few inches. There's not a whole lot of motion to the water within this cavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we see to the bottom? Is it that clear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea. I'm going to find a small rock-- Oh, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The edges of it, you can see, rise up into cliffs that have eroded over time and are rather stark in places.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plants! Look, living things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clarota? Is this in any way dangerous?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota, as you look over, is gliding into the cavern. It's the closest thing you can imagine seeing a mind flayer to smiling. He's looking about and in response to you, a few moments later, he says, "We're near home."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all remember his feet don't actually touch the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Do you know if there's anything in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances over to you. "There are many things in the water. Fish. Crustaceans." He points over, and you can see there is this small, very pale, colorless, whitish-gray crab that's over to the side, that looks weird, malformed. One claw is twisted on itself and dragging behind it. And it skitters off into the water. Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh snap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you two. As you all walk up to the edge of the shore line and you're inspecting the water, feeling for it. You look over and on the far left side of the shore, you can see just below the waterline what looks like... a sunken boat. Or two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't see shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? There's a sunken boat in the lake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really, should I go get it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Down here? Clarota, why? Why boats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many things wander these tunnels beyond my kin. We "are but one of its denizens."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's a good swimmer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me! I'm actually a really good swimmer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lady Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's a very good swimmer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys want to take a look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run over to the edge of the water and I do a swan dive and as I swan dive, I turn into a shark in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth's form jumps into the air, this thin, lithe half elven figure that then turns into this giant shark beast that (splash sound) into the water underneath. A few moments later, Grog jumps in. Big splashing sound.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to follow and I'll stay behind enough to where I can cast? Do I have to get in the water also?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You still can't quite see what everyone's going for, other than what she said.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, I'll get a little-- I won't jump in quite yet, but I'll get to the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because your veins certainly feel like they have upon impact. You immediately get over that as you transform into a natural creature that's used to cold water. Grog, it's fucking cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's a medical condition for a goliath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There aren't usually this many penis jokes in a session, folks. It just happens to be one of those days. So, glancing down below, you see it too. There are approximately two and a half boats that are made of some sort of a combination of wood and metal, like a heavily rusted iron. One of them looks mildly serviceable, the other one is broken with a large hole in the bottom of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a lap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around. There doesn't appear to be much else around, but you do catch what looks like a semblance of a half-eaten corpse, a bone that is left partially buried in the ground. You don't know how long that's been there, either. It's bleached bone at this point. Whatever fishes live in this landscape have picked it clean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's nothing in the boats at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We could just keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you come back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask him if the bridge is booby-trapped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a perception check, (mumbles) yep, yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still in the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm shivering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12. As a shark, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus three for shark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do a couple laps. Nothing really catches your eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gulps) I take a big breath and swim down to where the giant shark is. Can I also perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also attempt a perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is like one out of every five games that I get to. 12. Plus zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You found some boats, yo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are broken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go and I see that Grog's underwater and I Flipper him and go up under him and, "Hold on! "Here we go."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant shark comes up under you and nudges you aggressively and lifts you towards the surface.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dolphin hump him a little bit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well... You've heard of those-- never mind. I'm just going to keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all watch as Grog is now riding a shark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we ask Clarota if the bridge is safe to travel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota, is that mushroom forest, I mean, is that your home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go there? Should we skip it, Clarota?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The forest certainly surrounds the city."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I carry Grog over to the island on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The temple being central there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should not take the bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a lot of fungus to get through before the city. Are they still down there in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's wait until they get back before we decide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put this down here in case you want people to see that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where are we on that map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, can you pull up any of those boats?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull them up, Grog. Pull them up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over and I swim Grog over. And can I, as a shark, give some shark push from the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's two of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Potion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, we bought one (laughs).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wrote, "two underwater breathing," and didn't write what it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two underwater breathing biscuits. Two underwater breathing waffles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was totally potions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it was potions. I'm pretty sure they were potions.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What type of boat is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't had a good look at it yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to look, but I'm a shark, so I don't know shit, really. It's a boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so we swim up to the top and we come back to the shore and you're just in the water still. "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's down there? Do you need help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like some kind of boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all you got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My perception is shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we try again with someone who has better perception?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to go down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we're going to pull up one of those boats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should check out the boats first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to jump on my back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Is that all we need to do? Okay, fine." And I walk over to the thing and I jaunt off into the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius slowly disappears beneath the surface. It is cold!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Oh, it's so cold." I take out one of my bottles right before I go under. My bottle of air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His air bottle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the bubbles break on the surface and then eventually the bubbles stop. Tiberius may have drowned; you don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I swim over there. I use my tail. I think I'm a good swimmer. And I want to swim up to where I can see the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this doesn't take you too far. It's maybe 60 feet from the edge of the coastline.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, okay. Is it darkened? Can I see the boat now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, as long as you're traveling with a Light spell going on, which I assume you do at most points.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. I still have my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, you see there are two and a half boats, essentially. They're large, looks like they were meant specifically for travel. You're not quite sure where it may have come from.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How large is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's maybe about 15, almost 20 feet from end to end.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, so I notice it. You're nudging the one that you want, right? Is that's what's going on? So I notice that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and push it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I (ping) my Ioun Stone, direct Telekinesis to lift up the boat out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're putting your Ioun Stone on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He gave the other one to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, got you. Okay, so you put on the Ioun Stone.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I cast Telekinesis on the boat to lift it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I try to swim underneath it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's a rustle in the waves on the surface of the water, as you see all of a sudden this (impact sound) this bowing and splashing begins to occur. The ship begins to rise out of the sediment on the bottom of the lake.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I try to get it just right on the lip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets up. It's filled with water, you tip it on its side and spill the rest of the water out. There's still a large hole on the bottom of the boat, on the inside. And you carry it over back to the surface of the shore and rest it gently onto the rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you fit that boat in your Wheel of Mending?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm underwater. I'm going to jaunt back up, up to the surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, welcome to the surface. Can you use your Wheel of Mending on that boat that you just pulled up?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I put my bottle away. "I don't know. It's a good question. I mean, I don't see why not."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy could assist. He's got some engineering.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I can't help with the wheel, but I could repair the boat, in theory.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Percy, why don't you give it a whack before we put a boat on the Mending Wheel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a list of things that I'm going to need. I may have to send them down for more parts of boats from the other boats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try the wheel first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Telekinesis is still in effect currently, so if you wanted to do that, now would be the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bring up the broken boat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, yes, here you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Tiberius comes back with the half boat, essentially, that's cracked in half and part of it is ruined and broken. But there's still a sizeable amount of oxidized iron, metal, and wood here that you think would be serviceable for repairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please don't roll a one. Okay, so I'm going to do a little tinkering to see if I can get this fixed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you want to try the wheel first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys. So you're going to go ahead and make a tinkering check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do a tinkering check first and then try the wheel.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Why don't you tinker it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone want to help?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I use as my modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say this is a key point in time for a Scanlan song.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Yes, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use this bardic inspiration specifically for stuff like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I do. Yes, I will inspire you. I don't know what to sing. What's a boat song?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) The love boat...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does it start?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not feeling very inspired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) I'm on a boat, motherfucker! I'm on a motherfucking boat. (speaking) That's all I got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel inspired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Sailing...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Takes me away to where I've always heard it go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's worth a d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it wasn't Vax singing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. What do I add to the modifier, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You add whatever your tinkering bonus is, which should be your dex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My dex modifier, thanks. Thank god. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 13 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About an hour and a half to two hours later, you're sweating, your muscles are sore, but you feel like you've managed to get the hole for the most part patched. Now it's just to test its buoyancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to try the Mending Wheel?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My spell doesn't last that long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put it in the water and see what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start pushing the boat back in the water and I jump in and I start jumping up and down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push it in. You leap in the boat. It (impact sound) gives to the 600 pounds that are Grog. It splashes a bit, it lifts, it seems to be holding. It's leaving ripples in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will it fit all of us, you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stay a shark and follow in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's pile in the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I tow them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, we can make a harness out of rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be less conspicuous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Not as much rowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shark power is far less conspicuous.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I saunter on the boat up next to Grog and go, "Excuse me." As I open the bag of holding and take out the magic carpet (sound of carpet unfurling), and I hop on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get on the magic carpet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'd rather be a free agent on this one. I'm not here to fight on water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm setting up a gun mount on the boat, just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you guys want to get out the rope and put it around me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get out the rope and throw a loop for you to grab.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I swim through the loop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, get in the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clarota put the image all in our heads.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, there's an island over on that side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This way, or do we want to go this way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina, there is an island, there are also two small caves and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three small caves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, two small caves and then a path.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two and then rivers and paths out, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to check them all out? Clear out the fog of war.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could go straight for the big prize.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we all agreeing that, have we all decided to come here or here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Toward the island, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think if we can go here to this little island, I might be able to do some think-y, spy-y scrying stuff before we storm the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean, Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loot the cave first, and then the island.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cave first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cave first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, cave first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then island. Let's go there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we eventually want to take the temple and kill this son of a bitch, we probably want the shortest amount of distance on land as possible, which means coming in from the north end where Tiberius is pointing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Coming in through here, which is the least resistance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I agree.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Directly to the temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I think we're all a little slap happy and curious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That might be cliffs on the back end, though, you guys. We won't be able to scale those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, from the image that was given to you, any of those sections along the edge that have the jagged lines are cliffs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the north-western edge has a beach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, we're curious about the island?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just set sail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Set sail. Towards the island!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, Vox Machina, are we going to head around the southern, south-eastern edge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going, we're sailing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone know how to steer this thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm towing us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're shark-powered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, towing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on the carpet with you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, you guys continue down the right side of the path. You push off into the water, being towed by Keyleth in shark form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we put Pass Without a Trace on us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a shark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're pretty stealthy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hug the far wall, though. I'll hug the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, just barely beyond this point, looking across, the tops of a few buildings in the very, very distance. The color of the stone, from what you can make out, has almost a jade mixed with a grey marble. And you can just faintly make off in the distance one large pyramid-like structure that comes to a flattened precipice on top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is on the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the right there is another pebble beach, same consistency as the beach you first arrived on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the scale. Are we talking Manhattan and Brooklyn? Or smaller than that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To put to scale, your boat that you found is about that big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. So it's pretty big, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Should we land on the beach and then check out that little cave?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I think that's an excellent idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all very curious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not curious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're flying overhead, can I get a better look at if there's anything on the beach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as you guys come gliding down, you look at the beach. You see the ruins, you see, even though there is no real breeze or wind in this cold air, there is like a slight swaying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the beach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the trees that reside on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the little island-- the little cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can see, looking down, it's just a plain, pebble beach, an inlet there that goes into the cavern interior of the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get all up in that bad boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go in the cave?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's treasure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Treasure! Pirates! Arr!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I already have a ruby. I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay with the boat. As a shark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we fly in, Tiberius? And just go...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Stealth and fly in. Can we do that? Is that possible? To stealth and fly at the same time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try to keep quiet while doing so. The cave that actually opens up in the side of the wall within this cavern is about 20 feet up and about 25 feet across. So you're flying as low as you can, but you're still only about maybe 15 feet off the ground. Ten to 15 feet. Are the rest of you going in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're in the boat. But Grog and I want to go. Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm thinking it'll be a quick trip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the boat coming up to the beach?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. All right. I scoop up Scanlan and go piggyback style, like he's my son, and jump on the beach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll wait here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone who's entering the cavern, go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! Pretty flashy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, we are on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you enter this room, the smell is dreadful, and you can tell, using your light source over here, there appears to have been some sort of a struggle. There are bedrolls and sheets strewn about and soiled and burned and torn across the floor. There's about what looks like three or four different bedspreads that have been tossed and ruined. You can see a semblance of what was a fire pit, but all the soot and ash has been smeared across the ground to the outside of it. There appears to be a half buried chest or container off in the far corner. And you can see what looks to be four dead bodies, in a not too long state of decay. You can still see flesh and skin, but there's some bone peeking through, and they're all slumped against the ground, against the corners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, why don't you go mess with them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use perception on the chest and the bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is not that good. That is 13.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to use my earring of whisper right now. "There's some fun things in "here. Grog, you're not wearing it. Someone tell Grog he might need to kill something."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This looks a little dangerous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're killing something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be ready to run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come running in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm back from the chest. I take out one dagger and throw it at the chest to sink it into the lid. From a ways back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the dagger and (sound of dagger embedding into wood) into the wood. Doesn't seem to have any immediate effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I did a 13 perception check, I guess on the chest, so I'll go to try and open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has anybody run to the back of the cave yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all in the cave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're on my back, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog and Percy are still in the boat, at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we're listening in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog's running in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come running in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're in the process of stepping out of the boat at this point. As you begin to approach the chest, you notice one of the bodies shift. (moans) Its head rolls around and it looks at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?" She doesn't have one of the earpieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Someone call Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, undead!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, we're on our way. Pike, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys get out of the boat and begin rushing in that direction, you notice the one body looking over at you with this weird grin. You've had a few encounters with zombies or undead creatures that unnaturally move. This one has an intelligence to it that disturbs you. You glance over at the other bodies, who are already getting to their feet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where are the bodies located?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all groan)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, nuts!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No killing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're pirates! (growls)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a shark, still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come back, Ashley!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help us, Ashley!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, you could throw a shark at something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can toss a shark at a zombie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could use the shark like a baseball bat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could battering-ram a zombie with the shark and just go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sharks don't die as soon as they get out of the water. You can last a couple minutes out of the water if you're a fish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have sandpaper skin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So! (laughs) So we will pick up next week with the next episode of Critical Role, in which the party will deal with this sudden surrounding of some strange, partially-decomposed corpses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the undead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, the overlord has come!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Hey, guys! (all yay, cheer)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What's up, Zac?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Good job tonight, everybody. So, I just want to do one more shout-out to those t-shirts. Scroll down, buy some shirts. We have two weeks to sell 1,000 of them. This, to be totally honest, is to prove to the powers that be that Twitch is a viable resource for income (laughing weakly), woo!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And good entertainment, good entertainment.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Great entertainment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all know this is going to grow, so we're just getting ahead of the game.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Much like Scanlan's penis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Enough with the dick jokes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So, do you guys want to read all these messages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I'd love to!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So, we had quite a few donations tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes and, we broke PayPal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can charge through these real fast.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I might let you, yeah. Phew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: EasyShadow. "Hey guys, started watching two weeks ago, and I'm hooked! Got my paycheck, so I went "ahead and subbed, bought the shirt, and am now donating. Keep it up, guys. Thanks. Oh, and "#SaveGrog." Thank you, EasyShadow. That's awesome

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Save Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, MauhiduL, who I met on the Minecraft server the other day, which was amazing! If you guys haven't been on the Geek & Sundry Minecraft server. They've actually recreated physically, sequences from our campaign, like battlegrounds, and it's like walking through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a walkthrough! Yeah, actually, if you want a good, creative summary thus far, you can walk through this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got emotional walking through it

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I got all teary-eyed!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The pictures you were sending were amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. They were texting all of us the pictures.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's awesome! It says, "Love the show, love you guys, love Geek & Sundry, proud to "be a part of something so amazing." Thank you, MalheadL.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have fun with the new Manhattan-sized island. Minecraft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maxine196404. "I love to read and I can't imagine my life without it, so I want to help you "out." Aw. You guys are great. Thank you, Maxine! Claybmpt. "My vote last week nearly contributed to Trinket's demise, and I feel a little donation was only proper to make amends." (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smart.
