lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good on you. Kitten112. "Never experienced D&D until now and I love it more than I ever imagined "I would. Thank you for sharing your fun with us." Oh, thank you for watching! WeeklyFactoids. "Travis, what are the dimensions on your weapons and armor? I was wondering if I "could cosplay as Grog for my local con in September." (excited cheers)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Find Travis on Twitter, @WillingBlam, and ask him those questions that we haven't answered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get those clippers out, though. (bzzz)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you're going to be Grog, you've got to be bald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Critical Role cosplay?! That's so meta, I can't even--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: New hashtag. #RIPScanlanbeard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ElmoServant. Oh, no. "Just found out about the show last Thursday and marathoned every episode on "Friday. Critical Role is the best show on Geek & Sundry by far, though TableTop's pretty great, "too." Thank you, ElmoServant!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Alwiergen. I'm sorry if I butchered that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's the right pronunciation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scandinavian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take it. "Love Critical Role and ordered my shirt. Sam and Liam, when's the next "All Work No Play (nudge nudge, wink wink)."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, that's on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's only 20 more pages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second place is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's-- no. Just keep working on it. Just learn your material and improv. It's so much fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then get a cyborg brain, because that's what he has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) ElectricIdolon. "I had the honor of hitting the 2,700 sub mark tonight." That's awesome! "So why not go all the way tonight with a donation, as well? Also, holy mess, Mercer. You're "a beast." Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TheWroth. "Family favorites: Kid, Grog. Dad, Tiberius. Mom, Vax-- no, wait, Scanlan. Thank you "for sharing your talents with us." Aw, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The kid is very smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: LifeIsRosie.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: RealLifeRosie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loving my first edition Critical Role t-shirt and "will be getting the new one, too." Aw. "Keep sharing your adventures with all of us. Thank you, "Vox Machina." Thank you, Striker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just wanted to say we have more. We've had new ones come in. New ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: WeeklyFactoids. "Also, hopefully I can make Travis a great axe and Sam a sword after I finish "Liam and Laura's gifts, if you would like."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say that again?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: By the way, there's something really, really cool on its way here for you. Like, really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you do? What did you guys do? They want to make your axe and your sword now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They want to make my Singing Dawnblade?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis has been looking online. He wants his own axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I found one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was handling a couple at renfaire. It was kind of scary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Handling or courting? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for that, because I'd forgotten how "much fun I had doing that."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You should check out Warmachine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TheCrazyNixie. "Love the CritRole team, oh and pets Keyleth the shark." Genevels, "Great job Critical Role tonight, thanks for bringing back the t-shirts for round two. You "guys have encouraged me to start my own D&D group." Awesome! "I now #encourageboatriding"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want all of you guys to go find these books, find other people in your town or online, and play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And send pictures of your group to us. We'd love to see you guys play; it's great.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Tag us, tag Wizards of the Coast, say what's up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, tell Wizards of the Coast. Tell them we sent you.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yes, tag Wizards of the Coast, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "#1.5squareinches." Greeneyedtrobotonist. "Are you guys aware 300 shirts are already sold today?" Wow, awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 300. "Keep staying awesome, people." That's great! That's such good news.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I want 500 by tomorrow morning. That's all I'm saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we can do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The night is young.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can do it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The night is young. We're going to do a rebroadcast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was our goal for subscribers for the night, too?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Lucas, what was the final number on subs?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're 20 away from another TableTop giveaway, which we'll probably hit tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they're staying around for our questions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're not doing that tonight.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's next week. If we get 1,000 by next week, we'll do a Q&A.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 1000 shirts sold.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Are you saying you want to dance, is that what you're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Just kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can do a pretty late Q&A too. We'll figure it out. Make it worth everyone's while, too.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching tonight for our Thursday programming. We're going to run a rebroadcast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt will do a sexy dance if we sell 1,000 shirts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Lucas, just for Travis, do you mind playing that Overlord song to usher us out of the night? This is for you, Travis.

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: I can't find it. One second.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Oh, he's got to find it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't find our Overlord song.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, and also, for all you guys in the Philadelphia area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Me and Marisha, our fair Keyleth, are going to be at Wizard World Philly this weekend, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not just this weekend. In six hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our flight leaves in like two and a half hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, you've got to hurry to get to the airport.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well it leaves at 1:15, we'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah. But yeah, so if you guys are over in that area, you can come see us at Wizard World this weekend, we'll have panels and signings and general stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if you're at LAX at 1:15, you can meet them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hope you enjoyed it. Next time we'll kick off with a pretty intense goal, looks like.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It makes me smile everyday too, so thank you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for all your support.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's good. I love you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we have the song? (Overlord song plays.)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Song for Grog.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: No, it's a song for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They made this for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you erase the Overlord drawing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Someone made a song?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is metal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They made you a song.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like the Hulk is attacking the chat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Overlord overlord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great. It's on infinite repeat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoever made that, well done.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's Alex. He's our sound dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He did all the sound effects on your intro video.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, eagle cries. Absolutely necessary, well done. Guys, thanks again, we'll see you again next week, most definitely. All the love.
